messages.title: Vote for me, I'll fight for you
Fighting for local services
messages.content: Labour has transformed schools and hospitals locally through investment. The constituency has seen the benefits of a Labour government, but the area is under threat. The Tories are hitting local people hard. Clive will fight for public services and for the local community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for public services and for local communities.
Ensuring local hospital services remain intact and supporting the NHS.
Oppose disproportionate housing on greenfield sites and support developments that benefit the town.

issues.health: Proud of the NHS and will support it.

housing.content: Prevent housing on greenfield sites and ensure developments benefit the town.

leaflet.personalStatement: 'I want to hear from you' - Clive believes in listening to the community and encourages them to get in touch.

politicalExperience.role: Successful campaign to prevent housing on the Martine Gardens in Fleetwood.

endorsements.endorsement: People want an MP to listen carefully, work with local communities, and stand up boldly. Clive has deep roots, experience, and principles - he'll do well.

images.caption: Clive with campaigners against greenfield housing developments
Clive outside Central Lancaster High School, supporting local education

leaflet.additionalNotes: Clive is emphasizing his community roots and focus on local issues such as education, healthcare, and appropriate housing developments. There is a particular emphasis on opposing the development of greenfield sites for housing.
